title: Portfolio App
discover: Discover my skills, projects, and more.
about_me_content: I am Maher Boughdiri, a dedicated Full Stack Developer and Technical Support Specialist. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I bring creative solutions and technical excellence to every project. My journey in tech started in Tunisia, where I developed a passion for problem-solving and innovative thinking. Today, I leverage my skills to build robust, user-friendly applications and provide top-notch technical support. Whether coding a new feature or troubleshooting an issue, I thrive in dynamic environments and love turning complex challenges into opportunities for growth and learning.
current_job_description: Working on developing scalable web applications and APIs. Led a team of developers in various projects, focusing on improving code quality and performance.
navicom_job_description: Worked on an ERP system with React and PHP.
internship_description: Developed a social media site for the school environment.
bachelor_degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
bachelor_description: Studied various aspects of computer science including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Graduated with honors.
high_school_description: Focused on science and mathematics, participating in various extracurricular activities such as the coding club and math olympiad.
laravel_project_1_description: Developed a forum platform using Laravel, Vue.js, and released future functionality.
laravel_project_2_description: Worked on an ERP system using Laravel, Angular, and Ionic for customer management.
vue_project_description: Created a personal portfolio website using Vue.js, showcasing skills and projects.
angular_project_description: Implemented social media integration using Angular and Laravel for real-time updates.
flutter_project_description: Developed a mobile portfolio app using Flutter, showcasing skills and projects.
python_project_description: Designed and built a smart chat bot application in Python for automated responses.
ionic_project_description: Developed a mobile blogging application using Ionic, allowing users to post and share content.
